gurmukhi: ੴ ਸਤਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ॥
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realised through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ੧ ਜੇਹਾ ਬੀੳੁ ਤੇਹਾ ਫਲ
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realised through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਦੂੰ ਨੀਵੀ ਧਰਤਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਦਰਗਹ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਮਿਲੀ ਵਡਾੲੀ
transliteration: Sabh Doon Neeveen Dharati Hoi Daragah Andari Milee Vadaaee.
translation: The earth is most humble and hence respected in the court of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਕੋੲੀ ਗੋਡੈ ਵਾਹਿ ਹਲੁ ਕੋ ਮਲ ਮੂਤ ਕੁਸੂਤ ਕਰਾੲੀ
transliteration: Koee Godai Vaahi Halu Ko Mal Mootr Kousootr Karaaee.
translation: One hoes it, other ploughs it and someone impures it by defecating it.

gurmukhi: ਲਿੰਬਿ ਰਸੋੲੀ ਕੋ ਕਰੈ ਚੋਅਾ ਚੰਦਨੁ ਪੂਜ ਚੜਾੲੀ
transliteration: Libi Rasoee Ko Karai Choaa Chandanu Pooji Charhaaee.
translation: Plastering it one prepares kitchen over it and someone worships it by offering sandal sticks.

gurmukhi: ਜੇਹਾ ਬੀਜੈ ਸੋ ਲੁਣੈ ਜੇਹਾ ਬੀੳੁ ਤੇਹਾ ਫਲੁ ਪਾੲੀ
transliteration: Jayhaa Beejai So Lounai Jayhaa Beeu Dayhaa Phalu Paaee.
translation: One reaps what one sows and receives the fruit of seeds offered to earth.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲ ਸਹਜ ਘਰੁ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਣਾੲੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Sahaj Gharu Aapu Gavaai N Aapu Ganaaee.
translation: Getting stabilised in the innate nature gurmukhs receive the pleasure-fruits. Eschewing ego they never allow themselves to be counted anywhere.

gurmukhi: ਜਾਗ੍ਰਤ ਸੁਪਨ ਸੁਖੋਪਤੀ ੳੁਨਮਨਿ ਮਗਨ ਰਹੈ ਲਿਵਲਾੲੀ
transliteration: Jaagrat Soupan Soukhopatee Ounamani Magan Rahai Liv Laaee.
translation: They, in all the four stages - jagrat (conscious) svapan (dream), susupati (deep sleep or trance) and turiya (indetical with the supreme lord) - remain merged in the love of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਕਮਾੲੀ ॥੧॥
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gur Sabadu Kamaaee ?1?
translation: One accomplishes the word of the Guru in the company of saints.

gurmukhi: ੨ ਜਲ ਤੋਂ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ਼
translation: Lessons from water

gurmukhi: ਧਰਤੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜਲੁ ਵਸੈ ਜਲੁ ਬਹੁ ਰੰਗੀ ਰਸੀ ਮਿਲੰਦਾ
transliteration: Dharatee Andari Jalu Vasai Jalu Bahu Rangeen Raseen Miladaa.
translation: Water resides in the earth and mixes with all colours and saps.

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਜਿੳੁ ਕੋੲੀ ਚਲਾੲਿਦਾ ਨੀਵਾਂ ਹੁੲਿ ਨੀਵਾਣ ਚਲੰਦਾ
transliteration: Jioun Jioun Koee Chalaaidaa Neevaan Hoi Neevaani Chaladaa.
translation: As somebody goes on pushing it, it goes down and down.

gurmukhi: ਧੁਪੈ ਤਤਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਕੈ ਛਾਵੈਂ ਠੰਢਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਰਹੰਦਾ
transliteration: Dhoupai Tataa Hoi Kai Chhaavain Tdaddhaa Hoi Rahandaa.
translation: It remains hot in sunshine and cold in the shade.

gurmukhi: ਨਾਵਣੁ ਜੀਵਦਿਅਾਂ ਮੁੲਿਅਾਂ ਪੀਤੈ ਸਾਂਤਿ ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਹੋਵੰਦਾ
transliteration: Naavanu Jeevadiaan Muiaan Peetai Saanti Santokhu Hovandaa.
translation: Bathing, living, dying, drinking it always gives peace and satisfaction.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਰਮਲੁ ਕਰਦਾ ਮੈਲਿਅਾਂ ਨੀਵੈ ਸਰਵਰ ਜਾੲਿ ਟਿਕੰਦਾ
transliteration: Niramalu Karadaa Mailiaan Neevai Saravar Jaai Tikandaa.
translation: It makes impure ones pure and remains undisturbed in the lower tanks.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਭਾੳੁ ਭੳੁ ਸਹਜੁ ਬੈਰਾਗੁ ਸਦਾ ਵਿਗਸੰਦਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Bhaau Bhau Sahaju Bairaagu Sadaa Vigasandaa.
translation: Similarly, the gurmukh person in the love and fear of the Lord and observing indifference, full of equipoise remains delighted.

gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਨ ਪਰੳੁਪਕਾਰ ਕਰੰਦਾ ॥੨॥
transliteration: Pooranu Paraoupakaaru Karandaa ?2?
translation: Only perfect one undertakes altruism.

gurmukhi: ੩ ਕਮਲ ਤੋਂ ਅਲੇਪ
translation: Detached like lotus

gurmukhi: ਜਲ ਵਿਚਿ ਕਵਲੁ ਅਲਿਪਤੁ ਹੈ ਸੰਗ ਦੋਖ ਨਿਰਦੋਖ ਰਹੰਦਾ
transliteration: Jal Vichi Kavalu Alipatu Hai Sang Dokh Niradokh Rahandaa.
translation: The lotus residing in water remains unsmeared by it.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਤੀ ਭਵਰੁ ਲੁਭਾੲਿਦਾ ਸੀਤਲੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਸੁਗੰਧਿ ਮਿਲੰਦਾ
transliteration: Raatee Bhavaru Loubhaaidaa Seetalu Hoi Sougandhi Miladaa.
translation: In the night it attracts the black bee which gets coolness and fragrance from lotus.

gurmukhi: ਭਲਕੇ ਸੂਰਜ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਧਰਿ ਪਰਫੁਲਤੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਹਸੰਦਾ
transliteration: Bhalakay Sooraj Dhiaanu Dhari Paraphulatu Hoi Milai Hasandaa.
translation: In the morning it again meets the sun and being glad smiles the whole day.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਸੁਖ ਫਲ ਸਹਜਿ ਘਰ ਵਰਤਮਾਨ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਵਰਤੰਦਾ
transliteration: Guramoukh Soukh Phul Sahaji Ghari Varatamaan Andari Varatandaa.
translation: Gurmukhs (like lotus) reside in the innate house of pleasure fruit and utilise the present time fully i.e. they don't sit idle.

gurmukhi: ਲੋਕਾਚਾਰੀ ਲੋਕ ਵਿਚਿ ਵੇਦ ਵੀਚਾਰੀ ਕਰਮ ਕਰੰਦਾ
transliteration: Lokaachaaree Lok Vichi Vayd Veechaaree Karam Karandaa.
translation: To the ordinary people busy in mundane affairs they look engrossed in the world, and, to the people pondering over Vedas they look engaged in rituals.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਵਧਾਨੁ ਗੁਰ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਜੀਵਨਿ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਵਿਚਰੰਦਾ
transliteration: Saavadhaanu Guragiaan Vichi Jeevani Moukati Jougati Vicharandaa.
translation: But these gurmukhs, as a result of attaining knowledge from the Guru, keep consciousness in their possession and move in the world as liberated ones.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਵਸੰਦਾ ॥੨॥
transliteration: Saadhasangati Guru Sabadu Vasandaa ?3?
translation: In the congregation of the holy person resides the Guru-word.

gurmukhi: ੪ ਬ੍ਰਿੱਛ ਤੋਂ ਸਮਦਰਸੀ
translation: Impartial like tree

gurmukhi: ਧਰਤੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਬਿਰਖੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਹਿਲੋਂ ਦੇ ਜੜ ਪੈਰ ਟਿਕਾੲੀ
transliteration: Dharatee Andari Birakhu Hoi Pahilon Day Jarh Pair Tikaaee.
translation: Tree grows on earth and first of all it sets its feet into the earth.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਪਰਿ ਝੂਲੈ ਝਟੁਲਾ ਠੰਢੀ ਛਾੳੁਂ ਸੁ ਥਾੳੁਂ ਸੁਹਾੲੀ
transliteration: Oupari Jhoolai Jhatulaa Tdaddhee Chhaaoun Su Daaoun Suhaaee.
translation: People enjoy swinging over it and its cool shade adorns places.

gurmukhi: ਪਵਣੁ ਪਾਣੀ ਪਾਲਾ ਸਹੈ ਸਿਰ ਤਲਵਾੲਿਅਾ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਜਾੲੀ
transliteration: Pavanu Paanee Paalaa Sahai Sir Talavaaiaa Nihachalu Jaaee.
translation: It bears the impact of air, water and cold but still keeping its head inverse, it remains steadfast at its place.

gurmukhi: ਫਲ ਦੇ ਵਟ ਵਗਾੲਿਅਾਂ ਸਿਰਿ ਕਲਵਤੁ ਲੈ ਲੋਹੁ ਤਰਾੲੀ
transliteration: Phalu Day Vat Vagaaiaan Siri Kalavatu Lai Lohu Taraaee.
translation: When stoned, it gives fruit and even getting cut with the sawing machine it takes iron (in boats) across waters.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਜਨਮੁ ਸਕਾਰਥਾ ਪਰੳੁਪਕਾਰੀ ਸਹਜਿ ਸੁਭਾੲੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Janamu Sakaaradaa Paraoupakaaree Sahaji Soubhaaee.
translation: Life of gurmukhs is useful because by their natural temperament they are altruists.

gurmukhi: ਮਿਤ੍ਰ ਨ ਸਤ੍ਰ ਨ ਮੋਹੁ ਧ੍ਰੋਹ ਸਮਦਰਸੀ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਸਮਾੲੀ
transliteration: Mitr N Satr N Mohu Dhrohu Samadarasee Gur Sabadi Samaaee.
translation: They have no friend or foe. Away from infatuation and delusion they are unbiased and immersed in the word of the Guru.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਵਡਿਅਾੲੀ ॥੪॥
transliteration: Saadhasangati Guramati Vadiaaee ?4?
translation: Their grandness they attain through the wisdom of the Guru and the company of the holy persons.

gurmukhi: ੫ ਮਲਾਹ ਤੋਂ ਗੁਰੂ ਦਾ ਰੂਪਕ
translation: True Guru is the boatman

gurmukhi: ਸਾਗਰ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਬੋਹਿਥਾ ਵਿਚਿ ਮੁਹਾਣਾ ਪਰੳੁਪਕਾਰੀ
transliteration: Saagar Andari Bohidaa Vichi Muhaanaa Paraoupakaaree.
translation: The vessel is in the ocean and there is a benevolent sailor in it.

gurmukhi: ਭਾਰ ਅਥਰਬਣ ਲਦੀਅੈ ਲੈ ਵਾਪਾਰੁ ਚੜ੍ਹਨਿ ਵਾਪਾਰੀ
transliteration: Bhaar Adaraban Ladeeai Lai Vaapaaru Charhhani Vaapaaree.
translation: The vessel is amply loaded and the traders get boarded thereon.

gurmukhi: ਸਾੲਿਰ ਲਹਰ ਨ ਵਿਅਾਪੲੀ ਅਤਿ ਅਸਗਾਹ ਅਥਾਹ ਅਪਾਰੀ
transliteration: Saair Lahar N Viaapaee Ati Asagaah Adaah Apaaree.
translation: Waves of impassable ocean put no impact upon any one.

gurmukhi: ਬਾਹਲੇ ਪੂਰ ਲੰਘਾੲਿਦਾ ਸਹੀ ਸਲਾਮਤਿ ਪਾਰਿ ੳੁਤਾਰੀ
transliteration: Bahalay Poor Laghaaidaa Sahee Salaamati Paari Outaaree.
translation: That boatman takes the passengers across safe, dale and hearty. Those traders earn profits two or four times and gain in many ways.

gurmukhi: ਦੂਣੇ ਚੳੁਣੇ ਦੰਮ ਹੋਨ ਲਾਹਾ ਲੈ ਲੈ ਕਾਜ ਸਵਾਰੀ
transliteration: Doonay Chaounay Danm Hon Laahaa Lai Lai Kaaj Savaaree.
translation: Gurmukhs in the form of boatmen make people board the ship of holy congregation and take them across the impassable world-ocean.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਿ ਭਵਜਲ ਅੰਦਰ ਦੁਤਰੁ ਤਾਰੀ
transliteration: Guramoukh Soukh Phalu Saadh Sangi Bhavajal Andar Doutaru Taaree.
translation: Any liberated one alone can understand the mystery of the technique of the formless Lord.

gurmukhi: ਜੀਵਨ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੀ ॥੫॥
transliteration: Jeevan Moukati Jougati Nirankaaree ?5?
translation: Plant of sandal be becoming tree lives in the deep forests.

gurmukhi: ੬ ਬਾਵਨ ਚੰਦਨ ਤੋਂ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ
translation: From sandal to gurmukh

gurmukhi: ਬਾਵਨ ਚੰਦਨ ਬਿਰਖੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਵਣਖੰਡ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਵਸੈ ੳੁਜਾੜੀ
transliteration: Baavan Chandan Birakhu Hoi Vanakhand Andari Vasai Ujaarhee.
translation: Being near the vegetation, it keeps its head down and remains engrossed in meditation.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਸਿ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ਵਣਾਸਪਤਿ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਲਾੲਿ ੳੁਰਧ ਤਪ ਤਾੜੀ
transliteration: Paasi Nivaasu Vanaasapati Nihachalu Laai Uradh Tap Taarhee.
translation: Getting attached to the moving breeze it spreads the superfine fragrance.

gurmukhi: ਪਵਣ ਗਵਣ ਸਨਬੰਧੁ ਕਰਿ ਗੰਧ ਸੁਗੰਧ ੳੁਲਾਸ ੳੁਘਾੜੀ
transliteration: Pavan Gavan Sanabandhu Kari Gandh Sougandh Ulaas Oughaarhee.
translation: Whether with fruit or without fruit, all the trees are made fragrant by sandal tree.

gurmukhi: ਅਫਲ ਸਫਲ ਸਮਦਰਸ ਹੋੲਿ ਕਰੇ ਵਣਸਪਤਿ ਚੰਦਨ ਵਾੜੀ
transliteration: Aphal Saphal Samadaras Hoi Karay Vanasapati Chandan Vaarhee.
translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the company of holy persons, which purifies the impure ones even in one day (sitting).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗੁ ਪਤਿਤ ਪੁਨੀਤ ਕਰੈ ਦੇਹਾੜੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadh Sangu Patit Pouneet Karai Dayhaarhee.
translation: It fills the evil persons with virtues and in its fold the people of fragile character become strong and firm.

gurmukhi: ਅੳੁਗੁਣ ਕੀਤੇ ਗੁਣ ਕਰੈ ਕਚ ਪਕਾੲੀ ੳੁਪਰਿ ਵਾੜੀ
transliteration: Aougoun Keetay Goun Karai Kach Pakaaee Oupari Vaarhee.
translation: Neither water can drown nor fire can burn such people i.e. they go across the World Ocean and the flames of desires cannot reach them.

gurmukhi: ਨੀਰੁ ਨ ਡੋਬੈ ਅਗਿ ਨ ਸਾੜੀ ॥੬॥
transliteration: Neeru N Dobai Agi N Saarhee ?6?
translation: Neither water can drown nor fire can burn such people i.e. they go across the World Ocean and the flames of desires cannot reach them.

gurmukhi: ੭ ਸੂਰਜ ਤੋਂ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ
translation: Gurmukh benevolent like sun

gurmukhi: ਰਾਤਿ ਅਨ੍ਹੇਰੀ ਅੰਧਕਾਰੁ ਲਖ ਕਰੋੜੀ ਚਮਕਨ ਤਾਰੇ
transliteration: Raati Anhayree Andhakaaru Lakh Karorhee Chamakan Taaray.
translation: In the dark night myriad stars shine.

gurmukhi: ਘਰ ਘਰ ਦੀਵੇ ਬਾਲੀਅਨ ਪਰ ਘਰ ਤਕਨਿ ਚੋਰ ਚਕਾਰੇ
transliteration: Ghar Ghar Deevay Baaleeani Par Ghar Takani Chor Chagaaray.
translation: The houses are lit  by lighting the lamps but still the thieves also roam about for the purpose of stealing.

gurmukhi: ਹਟ ਪਟਣ ਘਰਬਾਰੀਅਾ ਦੇ ਦੇ ਤਾਕ ਸਵਨਿ ਨਰ ਨਾਰੇ
transliteration: Hat Patan Gharabaareeaa Day Day Taak Savani Nar Naaray.
translation: The householders shut the doors of their homes and shops before they go to sleep.

gurmukhi: ਸੂਰਜ ਜੋਤਿ ੳੁਦੋਤੁ ਕਰਿ ਤਾਰੇ ਤਾਰਿ ਅਨ੍ਹੇਰ ਨਿਵਾਰੇ
transliteration: Sooraj Joti Udotu Kari Taaray Taari Anhayr Nivaaray.
translation: The sun with its light dispels the darkness of night.

gurmukhi: ਬੰਧਨ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਕਰਾੲਿਦਾ ਨਾਮੁ ਦਾਨੁ ੲਿਸਨਾਨੁ ਵਿਚਾਰੇ
transliteration: Bandhan Moukati Karaaidaa Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Vichaaray.
translation: Likewise the gurmukh making people understand the importance of nam (meditation), dan (charity), and isnan (ablution) sets them free from the bondage (of  life and death).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਪਸੂ ਪਰੇਤ ਪਤਿਤ ਨਿਸਤਾਰੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhasangu Pasoo Parayt Patit Nisataaray.
translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the company of holy persons through which animals, ghosts and the fallen ones are salvaged and liberated.

gurmukhi: ਪਰੳੁਪਕਾਰੀ ਗੁਰੂ ਪਿਅਾਰੇ ॥੭॥
transliteration: Paraoupakaaree Guroo Piaaray ?7?
translation: Such beneficent persons are dear to the Guru.

gurmukhi: ੮ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਤ ਮਾਨ ਸਰੋਵਰ
translation: Manasarovar, the holy congregation

gurmukhi: ਮਾਨ ਸਰੋਵਰੁ ਅਾਖੀਅੈ ੳੁਪਰਿ ਹੰਸ ਸੁਵੰਸ ਵਸੰਦੇ
transliteration: Maan Sarovaru Aakheeai Oupari Hans Suvans Vasanday.
translation: It is said that on Manasarovar (lake) resides swans of the highest breed.

gurmukhi: ਮੋਤੀ ਮਾਣਕ ਮਾਨਸਰਿ ਚੁਣਿ ਚੁਣਿ ਹੰਸ ਅਮੋਲ ਚੁਗੰਦੇ
transliteration: Motee Maanak Maanasari Chouni Chouni Hans Amol Chouganday.
translation: In the Manasarovar are pearls and rubies and there invaluable jewels are picked up by swans to eat.

gurmukhi: ਖੀਰੁ ਨੀਰੁ ਨਿਰਵਾਰਦੇ ਲਹਰੀਂ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਫਿਰਨਿ ਤਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Kheeru Neeru Niravaaraday Lahareen Andari Dhirani Taranday.
translation: These swans separate water from milk and go on floating on the waves.

gurmukhi: ਮਾਨ ਸਰੋਵਰੁ ਛਡਿ ਕੈ ਹੋਰਤ ਥਾੲਿ ਨ ਜਾੲਿ ਬਹੰਦੇ
transliteration: Maan Sarovaru Chhadi Kai Horatu Daai N Jaai Bahanday.
translation: Leaving Manasarovar, they go nowhere to sit or reside.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗੁ ਪਰਮਹੰਸ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਸੋਹੰਦੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhasangu Param Hans Gurasikh Suohanday.
translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the congregation of holy persons wherein gurmukhs in the form of superior swans adorn the place.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕ ਮਨਿ ੲਿਕੁ ਧਿਅਾੲਿਦੇ ਦੂਜੇ ਭਾੲਿ ਨ ਜਾੲਿ ਫਿਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Ik Mani Iku Dhiaaiday Doojay Bhaai N Jaai Dhiranday.
translation: With single-minded devotion they concentrate upon the Lord and do not go astray to any other thought.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਅਲਖ ਲਖੰਦੇ ॥੮॥
transliteration: Sabadu Surati Liv Alakhu Lakhanday ?8?
translation: Merging their consciousness into the Word they behold that imperceptible Lord.

gurmukhi: ੯ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਪਾਰਸ
translation: Gurmukh is philosopher's stone

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਸੁ ਪਥਰੁ ਅਾਖੀਅੈ ਲੁਕਿਅਾ ਰਹੈ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਜਣਾੲੇ
transliteration: Paarasu Padaru Aakheeai Loukiaa Rahai N Aapu Janaaay.
translation: Philosopher's stone remains hidden and does not publicise itself.

gurmukhi: ਵਿਰਲਾ ਕੋੲਿ ਸਿਞਞਞਞਾਣਦਾ ਖੋਜੀ ਖੋਜਿ ਲੲੇ ਸੋ ਪਾੲੇ
transliteration: Viralaa Koi Siaanadaa Khojee Khoji Laay So Paaay.
translation: Any rare one identifies it and only a prospector gets it.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਸੁ ਪਰਸਿ ਅਪਰਸੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਸਟਧਾਤੁ ੲਿਕ ਧਾਤੁ ਕਰਾੲੇ
transliteration: Paarasu Parasi Aparasu Hoi Asat Dhaatu Ik Dhaatu Karaaay.
translation: Touching that stone, the lowly metals transform into one metal, gold.

gurmukhi: ਬਾਰਹ ਵੰਨੀ ਹੋੲਿ ਕੈ ਕੰਚਨ ਮੁਲਿ ਅਮੁਲਿ ਵਿਕਾੲੇ
transliteration: Baarah Vannee Hoi Kai Kanchanu Muli Amuli Vikaaay.
translation: Becoming pure gold those metals are sold as invaluable ones.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਸਾਧਸੰਗ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਅਘੜ ਘੜਾੲੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukhaphal Saadhasangu Sabad Surati Liv Agharh Gharhaaay.
translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the holy congregation where merging consciousness into Word, the clumsy mind is chiselled into beautiful shape.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਣਿ ਸਰਣਿ ਲਿਵਲੀਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਸੈਂਸਾਰੀ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੀ ਭਾੲੇ
transliteration: Charani Sarani Liv Leenu Hoi Sainsaaree Nirankaaree Bhaaay.
translation: Even a worldly person here, concentrating upon the feet of Guru, becomes dear to God, the formless One.

gurmukhi: ਘਰਿ ਬਾਰੀ ਹੋੲਿ ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਜਾੲੇ ॥੯॥
transliteration: Ghari Baaree Hoi Nij Ghari Jaaay ?9?
translation: Becoming householder, man resides in his innate nature (atman).

gurmukhi: ੧੦ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਸਭ ਥੋਂ ੳੁੱਚੇ ਹਨ
translation: Gurmukhs are the highest ones

gurmukhi: ਚਿੰਤਾਮਣਿ ਚਿੰਤਾ ਹਰੈ ਕਾਮਧੇਨੁ ਕਾਮਨਾਂ ਪੁਜਾੲੇ
transliteration: Chintaamani Chintaa Harai Kaamadhaynu Kaamanaan Pujaaay.
translation: Chintamani alleviates anxieties and wish-fulfilling cow (kamadhena) fulfils all desires.

gurmukhi: ਫਲ ਫੁਲਿ ਦੇਂਦਾ ਪਾਰਜਾਤ ਰਿਧਿ ਸਿਧਿ ਨਿਧਿ ਨਵ ਨਾਥ ਲੁਭਾੲੇ
transliteration: Phal Phuli Dayndaa Paarajaatu Ridhi Sidhi Nav Naad Loubhaaay.
translation: Parijat tree gives flowers and fruits and the nine naths are engrossed with the miraculous powers.

gurmukhi: ਦਸ ਅਵਤਾਰ ਅਕਾਰ ਕਰਿ ਪੁਰਖਾਰਥ ਕਰਿ ਨਾਂਵ ਗਣਾੲੇ
transliteration: Das Avataar Akaar Kari Purakhaarad Kari Naanv Ganaaay.
translation: The ten incarnations (of Hindu mythology) assumed human body and showed their valour to spread their names.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਚਾਰਿ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਸੇਵਾ ਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhasangu Chaari Padaarad Sayvaa Laaay.
translation: The pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs is the holy congregation wherein all the four ideals of life (dharma, arth, kam and moks) serve themselves.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਪਿਰਮ ਰਸੁ ਅਕਥ ਕਹਾਣੀ ਕਥੀ ਨ ਜਾੲੇ
transliteration: Sabadu Surati Liv Piram Rasu Akad Kahaanee Kadee N Jaaay.
translation: The consciousness of gurmukhs there remains merged in the Word and the story of their love is ineffable.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲ ਹੁੲਿ ਅਛਲ ਛਲਾੲੇੇ
transliteration: Paarabraham Pooran Braham Bhagati Vachhal Hui Achhal Chhalaaay.
translation: The transcendental Brahm is the perfect Brahm who by becoming affectionate to devotees puts many deceitful persons in the web of deception.

gurmukhi: ਲੇਖ ਅਲੇਖ ਨ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਪਾੲੇ ॥੧੦॥
transliteration: Laykh Alaykh N Keemati Paaay ?10?
translation: The Lord is free from all accounts and none can understand His mystery.

gurmukhi: ੧੧ ਕਾਦਰ ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਅਾਲਾ
translation: Creator's cup of love

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕੁ ਕਵਾੳੁ ਪਸਾੳੁ ਕਰਿ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰਿ ਅਾਕਾਰੁ ਬਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Iku Kavaau Pasaau Kari Nirankaari Aakaaru Banaaiaa.
translation: With a single Word that formless Lord created the whole world.

gurmukhi: ਤੋਲਿ ਅਤੋਲੁ ਨਾ ਤੋਲੀਅੈ ਤੁਲਿ ਨ ਤੁਲਾਧਾਰਿ ਤੋਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Toli Atolu N Toleeai Tuli N Tulaadhaari Tolaaiaa.
translation: Extension of the Lord (this world) can in no way be measured.

gurmukhi: ਲੇਖ ਅਲੇਖੁ ਨ ਲਿਖੀਅੈ ਅੰਗ ਨ ਅਖਰੁ ਲੇਖ ਲਿਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Laykh Alaykhu N Likheeai Angu N Akharu Laykh Likhaaiaa.
translation: By no account this world can be understood because all numerals and letters come to an end for this.

gurmukhi: ਮੁਲਿ ਅਮੁਲ ਨ ਮੋਲੀਅੈ ਲਖ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਲਵੈ ਨ ਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Muli Amulu N Moleeai Lakhu Padaarad Lavai N Laaiaa.
translation: Myriad kinds of its materials are invaluable; their price cannot be fixed.

gurmukhi: ਬੋਲਿ ਅਬੋਲ ਨ ਬੋਲੀਅੈ ਸੁਣਿ ਸੁਣਿ ਅਾਖਣੁ ਅਾਖਿ ਸੁਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Boli Abolu N Boleeai Souni Souni Aakhanu Aakhi Sounaaiaa.
translation: Even through speech, nothing can be said and heard about it.

gurmukhi: ਅਗਮੁ ਅਥਾਹ ਅਗਾਧ ਬੋਧ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Agamu Adaahu Agaadhi Bodh Antu N Paaraavaaru N Paaiaa.
translation: This world in unapproachable, unfathomable and full of mystery; its mystique cannot be understood.

gurmukhi: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕੀਮ ਨ ਜਾਣੀਅੈ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਕਾਦਰੁ ਕਿਤੁ ਘਰਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kudarati Keem N Jaaneeai Kayvadu Kaadaru Kitu Ghari Aaiaa.
translation: When it is impossible to understand the creation, how could its Creator's greatness and His residence be known?

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhasangu Sabadu Surati Liv Alakh Lakhaaiaa.
translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the holy congregation where by merging the consciousness in the Word that invisible Lord is visualised.

gurmukhi: ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਅਾਲਾ ਅਜਰੁ ਜਰਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੧੧॥
transliteration: Piram Piaalaa Ajaru Jaraaiaa ?11?
translation: In the holy congregation, the unbreakable cup of love is drunk by becoming tolerant.

gurmukhi: ੧੨ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਤ ਸੱਚਖੰਡ
translation: Holy Congregation, the abode of truth

gurmukhi: ਸਾਦਹੁ ਸਬਦਹੁ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਕਿੳੁਂ ਜਿਹਬਾ ਜਾਣੈ
transliteration: Saadahu Sabadahu Baaharaa Akad Kadaa Kioun Jihabaa Jaanai.
translation: The Lord is beyond taste and words; how can His ineffable story be told by tongue?

gurmukhi: ੳੁਸਤਤਿ ਨਿੰਦਾ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਕਥਨੀ ਬਦਨੀ ਵਿਚਿ ਨ ਅਾਣੈ
transliteration: Ousatati Nidaa Baaharaa Kadanee Badanee Vichi N Aanai.
translation: He being beyond praise and slander does not come in the periphery of telling and hearing.

gurmukhi: ਗੰਧ ਸਪਰਸ ਅਗੋਚਰਾ ਨਾਸ ਸਾਸ ਹੇਰਤਿ ਹੈਰਾਣੈ
transliteration: Gandh Saparasu Agocharaa Naas Saas Hayrati Hairaanay.
translation: He is beyond smell and touch and the nose, and the breath is also wonder-struck but cannot know Him.

gurmukhi: ਵਰਨਹੁ ਚਿਹਨਹੁ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਦਿਸਟਿ ਅਦਿਸਟਿ ਨ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਧਿਙਾਣੈ
transliteration: Varanahu Chihanahu Baaharaa Disati Adisati N Dhiaanu Dhiaanai.
translation: He is away from any varna and symbolism and is even beyond the sight of concentration.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਰਾਲੰਬੁ ਅਵਲੰਬ ਵਿਣੁ ਧਰਤਿ ਅਗਾਸਿ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ਵਿਡਾਣੈ
transliteration: Niraalabu Avalab Vinu Dharati Agaasi Nivaasu Vidaanai.
translation: Without any prop He resides in the grandeur of earth and sky.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚਖੰਡਿ ਹੈ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੁ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਸਿਞਞਞਞਾਣੈ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Sachakhandi Hai Nirankaaru Gur Sabadu Siaanai.
translation: Holy congregation is the abode of truth where through the word of the Guru, the formless Lord is recognised.

gurmukhi: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕਾਦਰ ਨੋਂ ਕੁਰਬਾਣੈ ॥੧੨॥
transliteration: Kudarati Kaadar No Kurabaanai ?12?
translation: Whole of this creation is sacrifice unto the creator.

gurmukhi: ੧੩ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਾਂ ਦਾ ਸੱਚਾ ਰਸਤਾ
translation: The true way of gurmukhs

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥੁ ਅਗੰਮੁ ਹੈ ਜਿੳੁ ਜਲ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਮੀਨੁ ਚਲੰਦਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Pandu Aganm Hai Jiu Jal Andari Meenu Chaladaa.
translation: As the path of fish in water is unknowable, the way of gurmukhs is also unapproachable.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਖੋਜੁ ਅਲਖੁ ਹੈ ਜਿੳੁ ਪੰਖੀ ਅਾਗਾਸ ੳੁਡੰਦਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Khoju Alakhu Hai Jiu Pankhee Aagaas Udandaa.
translation: As the path of birds flying in the sky cannot be known, the thoughtful and search-orientated way of gurmukh is also imperceptible. It cannot be understood.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਰਹਰਾਸਿ ਹੈ ਹਰਿ ਚੰਦੳੁਰੀ ਨਗਰੁ ਵਸੰਦਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Raharaasi Hai Hari Chandauree Nagaru Vasandaa.
translation: Holy congregation is the straight path for gurmukhs and this world is full of illusions for them.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ਤੰਬੋਲ ਰਸੁ ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਅਾਲੈ ਰੰਗੁ ਚੜੰਦਾ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Tanbol Rasu Piram Piaalai Rangu Charandaa.
translation: As the four colours of betel catechu, betelnut, lime and betel lead become one (red) colour (of joy-giving love), the gurmukhs also enjoy the cup of the Lord's love.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਲੀਣੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਚੰਦਨ ਵਾਸ ਨਿਵਾਸ ਕਰੰਦਾ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Leenu Hoi Chandan Vaas Nivaas Karandaa.
translation: As the fragrance of sandal comes to reside in other plants, they merging their consciousness into Word reside in the hearts of others.

gurmukhi: ਗਿਅਾਨੁ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਸਿਮਰਣੁ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਕੂੰਜਿ ਕੂਰਮ ਹੰਸ ਵੰਸ ਵਧੰਦਾ
transliteration: Giaanu Dhiaanu Simaranu Jougati Koonji Kooram Hans Vans Vadhandaa.
translation: By means of knowledge, meditation and remembrance, they like cranes, tortoise and swans expand their family or tradition.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖੰਦਾ ॥੧੩॥
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Alakh Lakhandaa ?13?
translation: The gurmukhs come face to face with God, the pleasure of all fruits.

gurmukhi: ੧੪ ੲੀਸ਼੍ਵਰ ਅਲੱਖ ਹੈ
translation: The Lord is imperceptible

gurmukhi: ਬ੍ਹਮਾਦਿਕ ਵੇਦਾ ਸਣੈ ਨੇਤਿ ਨੇਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਭੇਦੁ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Brahamaadik Vaydaan Sanai Nayti Nayti Kari Bhaydu N Paaiaa.
translation: Brahmas alongwith the Vedas have declared Him this is not, this is not (neti neti) and these all could not known His mystery.

gurmukhi: ਮਹਾਦੇਵ ਅਵਧੂਤ ਹੋੲਿ ਨਮੋ ਨਮੋ ਕਰਿ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਨ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Mahaadayv Avadhootu Hoi Namo Namo Kari Dhiaani N Aaiaa.
translation: By becoming avadhut (a kind of superior yogi), Madadev also recited his name but his meditation could not attain him.

gurmukhi: ਦਸ ਅਵਤਾਰ ਅਕਾਰੁ ਕਰਿ ੲੇਕੰਕਾਰ ਨ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Das Avataar Akaaru Kari Aykankaaru N Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.
translation: Ten incarnations also flourished but none could perceive ekhankar, the supreme Lord.

gurmukhi: ਰਿਧਿ ਸਿਧਿ ਨਿਧਿ ਨਾਥ ਨੳੁ ਅਾਦਿ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਅਾਦੇਸ ਕਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Ridhi Sidhi Nidhi Naad Nau Aadi Purakhu Aadaysu Karaaiaa.
translation: Nine naths, the treasures of miraculous powers, also bowed before that Lord.

gurmukhi: ਸਹਸ ਨਾਵ ਲੈ ਸਹਸ ਮੁਖ ਸਿਮਰਣਿ ਸੰਖ ਨ ਨਾੳੁ ਧਿਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sahas Naanv Lai Sahas Moukh Simarani Sankh N Naaoun Dhiaaiaa.
translation: Sesang (mythical snake) with its thousand mouths remembered Him by thousands of names, but its recitation could not be accomplished.

gurmukhi: ਲੋਮਸ ਤਪੁ ਕਰਿ ਸਾਧਨਾ ਹੳੁਮੈ ਸਾਧਿ ਨ ਸਾਧੁ ਸਦਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Lomas Tapu Kari Saadhanaa Haoumai Saadhi N Saadhu Sadaaiaa.
translation: Sage Lomas rigorously undertook ascetic discipline but could not overcome his ego and could not be called a true ascetic.

gurmukhi: ਚਿਰ ਜੀਵਣੁ ਬਹੁ ਹੰਢਣਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਲੁ ਨ ਚਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chiru Jeevanu Bahu Handdhanaa Guramoukhi Soukhu Phalu Palu N Chakhaaiaa.
translation: Ever-living Markandey spent a long life but could not taste the pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs.

gurmukhi: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਭਰਮਿ ਭੁਲਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੧੪॥
transliteration: Kudarati Andari Bharami Bhulaaiaa ?14?
translation: All mentioned above remained deluded while living on earth.

gurmukhi: ੧੫ ਅੰਜਨ ਵਿਚ ਨਿਰੰਜਨ ਪਾਨਾ
translation: Attainment of Lord amidst maya

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਭਗਤਿਵਛਲ ਹੋੲਿ ਵਸਿਗਤ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukhaphalu Saadhasangu Bhagati Vachhal Hoi Vasigati Aaiaa.
translation: The pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs is holy congregation and controlled by this holy congregation, the Lord comes here as lover of the devotees.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਰਣ ਕਰਤੇ ਵਸਿ ਹੈ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਕਰੇ ਕਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kaaranu Karatay Vasi Hai Saadhasangati Vichi Karay Karaaiaa.
translation: All the causes are under control of the creator but in the holy congregation He does everything in accordance with the wishes of the devotees and the saints.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਭਾਣਾ ਭਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paarabrahamu Pooran Brahamu Saadhasangati Vichi Bhaanaa Bhaaiaa.
translation: The transcendetal Brahm is the perfect Brahm and He likes the will of the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਰੋਮ ਰੋਮ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਖਿਓਨੁ ਕਰਿ ਬ੍ਹਮੰਡ ਕਰੋੜਿ ਸਮਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Rom Rom Vichi Rakhiaonu Kari Brahamand Karorhi Samaaiaa.
translation: In his every trichome are absorbed crores of universes.

gurmukhi: ਬੀਅਹੁ ਕਰਿ ਬਿਸਥਾਰ ਵੜੁ ਫਲ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਫਿਰਿ ਬੀੳੁ ਵਸਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Beeahu Kari Bisadaaru Varhu Phal Andari Dhiri Beeu Vasaaiaa.
translation: From one seed comes out banyan tree and in its fruits again the seeds reside.

gurmukhi: ਅਪਿੳੁ ਪੀਅਣੁ ਅਜਰੁ ਜਰਣੁ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਜਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Apiu Peeanu Ajur Jaranu Aapu Gavaai N Aapu Janaaiaa.
translation: Who quaffing the nectar have devotedly adopted the unbearable in their mind, the eschewing their ego have never made themselves noticed.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਜਨੁ ਵਿਚਿ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੧੫॥
transliteration: Anjanu Vichi Niranjanu Paaiaa ?15?
translation: Such true persons while being amidst maya have attained that immaculate Lord.

gurmukhi: ੧੬ ਵਾਹਿਗੁਰੂ ਪਰੇ ਤੋਂ ਪਰੇ ਹੈ
translation: Waheguru, the wondrous Lord is beond all limits

gurmukhi: ਮਹਿਮਾ ਮਹਿ ਮਹਿਕਾਰ ਵਿਚਿ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਲਖ ਨ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਜਾਣੈ
transliteration: Mahimaa Mahi Mahikaar Vichi Mahimaa Lakh N Mahimaa Jaanai.
translation: Even the people spreading the fragrance of His grandeur don’t understand the real nature of His greatness.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਮਹਾਤਮ ਮਹਾਤਮਾਂ ਤਿਲ ਨ ਮਹਾਤਮੁ ਅਾਖਿ ਵਖਾਣੈ
transliteration: Lakh Mahaatam Mahaatamaa Til N Mahaatamu Aakhi Vakhaanai.
translation: Lakhs of saint explain the gist and significance of that Lord but even all joined could not put forth even a fraction of His grandeur.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਸਤਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਲਖ ੳੁਸਤਤੀ ਪਲ ੳੁਸਤਤਿ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਹੈਰਾਣੈ
transliteration: Ousatati Vichi Lakh Ousatatee Pal Ousatati Andari Hairaanai.
translation: Myriad eulogists are wonder struck (because they could not eulogise Him properly)

gurmukhi: ਅਚਰਜ ਵਿਚਿ ਲਖ ਅਚਰਜਾ ਅਚਰਜ ਅਚਰਜ ਚੋਜ ਵਿਡਾਣੈ
transliteration: Acharaj Vichi Lakh Acharajaa Acharaj Acharaj Choj Vidaanai.
translation: Millions of wonders are full of wonder and they are further surprised to see the awe-inspiring feats of the Lord, the all wonder Himself.

gurmukhi: ਵਿਸਮਾਦੀ ਵਿਸਮਾਦ ਲਖ ਵਿਸਮਾਦਹੁ ਵਿਸਮਾਦ ਵਿਹਾਣੈ
transliteration: Visamaadee Visamaad Lakh Visamaadahu Visamaad Vihaanai.
translation: Looking at the completeness of the wonder of that wondrous Lord, the elation feels elated and exhausted.

gurmukhi: ਅਬਗਤਿ ਗਤਿ ਅਤਿ ਅਗਮ ਹੈ ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਅਾਖਾਣ ਵਖਾਣੈ
transliteration: Abagati Gati Ati Agam Hai Akad Kadaa Aakhaan Vakhaanai.
translation: The dynamism of that unmanifest Lord is extremely unapproachable and even a shirt account of His grand story is ineffable.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਪਰਵਾਣ ਪਰੈ ਪਰਵਾਣੈ ॥੧੬॥
transliteration: Lakh Paravaan Parai Paravaanai ?16?
translation: His measurement is beyond lacs of measures.

gurmukhi: ੧੭ ਵਾਹਿਗੁਰੂ ਪਰੇ ਤੋਂ ਪਰੇ ਹੈ
translation: Waheguru, the wondrous Lord is beond all limits

gurmukhi: ਅਗਮਹੁ ਅਗਹੁ ਅਗੰਮ ਹੈ ਅਗਮੁ ਅਗਮੁ ਅਤਿ ਅਗਮੁ ਸੁਣਾੲੇ
transliteration: Agamahu Agamu Aganmu Hai Agamu Agamu Ati Agamu Sounaaay.
translation: The Lord is beyond accessibility and all call Him extremely inaccessible.

gurmukhi: ਅਲਖਹੁ ਅਲਖੁ ਅਲਖੁ ਹੈ ਅਲਖੁ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖ ਅਲਖੁ ਧਿਅਾੲੇ
transliteration: Alakhahu Alakhu Alakhu Hai Alakhu Alakhu Lakh Alakhu Dhiaaay.
translation: He was imperceptible; He is imperceptible and will remain inaccessible i.e. He is beyond all meditations.

gurmukhi: ਅਪਰੰਪਰੁ ਅਪਰੰਪਰਹੁਂ ਅਪਰੰਪਰੁ ਅਪਰੰਪਰੁ ਭਾੲੇ
transliteration: Aparanparu Aparanparahu Aparanparu Aparanparu Bhaaay.
translation: Beyond all limits whatsoever is illimitable; the Lord is beyond imagination.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਗੋਚਰ ਅਾਗੋਚਰਹੁਂ ਅਾਗੋਚਰ ਅਾਗੋਚਰਿ ਜਾੲੇ
transliteration: Aagocharu Aagocharahu Aagocharu Aagochari Jaaay.
translation: He is imperceptible of the imperceptibles and is beyond the reach of sense organs.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਅਾਗਾਧਿ ਅਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Paarabrahamu Pooran Brahamu Saadhasangati Aagaadhi Alaaay.
translation: The transcendental Brahm is the perfect Brahm who is eulogised in the holy congregation in many ways.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲੁ ਪਿਰਮ ਰਸੁ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਛਲ ਛਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Piram Rasu Bhagati Vachhalu Hoi Achhalu Chhalaaay.
translation: The joy of His love is the pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs. The Lord is loving to devotees but is never deluded even by the biggest cheats

gurmukhi: ਵੀਹ ੲਿਕੀਹ ਚੜ੍ਹਾੳੁ ਚੜ੍ਹਾੲੇ ॥੧੭॥
transliteration: Veeh Ikeeh Charhhaau Charhhaaay ?17?
translation: By his grace alone, one can go across the World Ocean enthusiastically.

gurmukhi: ੧੮ ਪਰਮੇਸ਼ੁਰ ਦਾ ਲਖਾੳੁਣਾ
translation: The true Guru has shown the imperceptible

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰਿ ਅਾਕਾਰੁ ਬਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paarabrahamu Pooran Brahamu Nirankaari Aakaaru Banaaiaa.
translation: The transecental Brahm is the perfect Brahm and that very formless (Lord) has created all the forms of universe.

gurmukhi: ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਗਤਿ ਅਾਗਾਧਿ ਬੋਧ ਗੁਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਹੁੲਿ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Abigati Gati Aagaadhi Bodh Gur Moorit Hoi Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.
translation: He is ummanifest, unfathomable and imperceptible for intellect, but Guru, the icon of beauty, has made me behold the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚਖੰਡ ਵਿਚਿ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਛਲ ਛਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Sachakhand Vichi Bhagati Vachhal Hoi Achhal Chhalaaiaa.
translation: In holy congregation, the abode of the truth, He emerges as tender towards devotees and deludes even those who never get deluded.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨਿ ੲਿਕ ਵਰਨ ਹੁੲਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਾਦੇਸੁ ਕਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Ik Varan Hui Aadi Purakh Aadaysu Karaaiaa.
translation: The Guru alone unites all the four varnas to make them one and further makes them bow before the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਧਿਅਾਨ ਮੂਲ ਦਰਸਨੁ ਗੁਰੂ ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨ ਦਰਸਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Dhiaan Moolu Darasanu Guroo Chhia Darasan Darasan Vichi Aaiaa.
translation: At the base of all ascetic disciplines is the philosophy of the Guru in which all the six philosophies  (of Indian tradition) get subsumed.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਜਣਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੧੮॥
transliteration: Aapay Aapi N Aapu Janaaiaa ?18?
translation: He himself is everything but never makes Himself noticed by anyone.

gurmukhi: ੧੯ ਗੁਰੂ ਦੀ ਸ਼ਰਣ
translation: The shelter of the Guru

gurmukhi: ਚਰਣ ਕਵਲ ਸਰਣਾਗਤੀ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਿਖ ਅਾੲੇ
transliteration: Charan Kaval Saranaagatee Saadhasangati Mili Guru Sikh Aaay.
translation: In the holy congregation, the disciples of the Guru come in the shelter of the holy feet of the Guru.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਦਿਸਟਿ ਨਿਹਾਲੁ ਕਰਿ ਦਿਬ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਦੇ ਪੈਰੀ ਪਾੲੇ
transliteration: Anmrit Disati Nihaalu Kari Dib Drisati Day Pairee Paaay.
translation: The nectar like sight of the Guru has blest one and all and due to his divine look, the Guru has put them all at the holy feet (shelter) i.e. they all have been made humble.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਣ ਰੇਣੁ ਮਸਤਕਿ ਤਿਲਕ ਭਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਦਾ ਲੇਖੁ ਮਿਟਾੲੇ
transliteration: Charan Raynu Masataki Tilak Bharam Karam Daa Laykhu Mitaaay.
translation: The Sikhs applied the dust of the feet to their forehead and now their account of delusive actions has been erased.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਣੋਦਕ ਲੈ ਅਾਚਮਨੁ ਹੳੁਮੈ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਰੋਗੁ ਗਵਾੲੇ
transliteration: Charanodaku Lai Aachamanu Haoumai Doubidhaa Rogu Gavaaay.
translation: After drinking the nectar of feet, their maladies of ego and duality have been cured.

gurmukhi: ਪੈਰੀਂ ਪੈ ਪਾਖਾਕੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਜੀਵਨ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਸਹਜ ਘਰਿ ਅਾੲੇ
transliteration: Paireen Pai Paa Khaaku Hoi Jeevan Moukati Sahaj Ghari Aaay.
translation: Falling at the feet, becoming the dust of feet and adopting the way of liberated ones in life they have established themselves in equipoise.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਣ ਕਵਲ ਵਿਚਿ ਭਵਰ ਹੋੲਿ ਸੁਖ ਸੰਪਟ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਲੁਭਾੲੇ
transliteration: Charan Kaval Vichi Bhavar Hoi Soukh Sanpad Makarandi Loubhaaay.
translation: Now having become the black bees of the lotus feet, they are enjoying the nectar of pleasure and delight.

gurmukhi: ਪੂਜ ਮੂਲ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਚਰਣ ਦੁਤੀਅਾ ਨਾਸਤਿ ਲਵੈ ਨ ਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Pooj Mool Satiguru Charan Douteeaa Naasati Lavai N Laaay.
translation: The base of worship with them are the lotus feet of the true Guru and they do not allow duality to come near them now.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਗੁਰ ਸਰਣਾੲੇ ॥੧੯॥
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Gur Saranaaay ?19?
translation: The pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs is the shelter of the Guru.

gurmukhi: ੨੦ ਗੁਰ ਵਿਸ਼ੇਖਤਾ ਵਰਣਨ
translation: Greatness of the  trueGuru

gurmukhi: ਸਾਸਤ੍ਰ ਸਿੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵੇਦ ਲਖ ਮਹਾਂਭਾਰਥ ਰਾਮਾੲਿਣ ਮੇਲੇ
transliteration: Saasatr Sinmriti Vayd Lakh Mahaan Bhaarad Raamaain Maylay.
translation: Even if Shastras, Smritis, Lakhs of Vedas, Mahabharat, Ramayan etc. are joined together;

gurmukhi: ਸਾਰ ਗੀਤਾ ਲਖ ਭਾਗਵਤ ਜੋਤਕ ਵੈਦ ਚਲੰਤੀ ਖੇਲੇ
transliteration: Saar Geetaa Lakh Bhaagavat Jotak Vaid Chalatee Khaylay.
translation: Thousands of gists of the Gita, Bhagvats, books of astronomy and acrobats of physicians are joined;

gurmukhi: ਚੳੁਦਹ ਵਿਦਿਅਾ ਸਾਅੰਗੀਤ ਬ੍ਹਮੇ ਬਿਸਨ ਮਹੇਸੁਰ ਭੇਲੇ
transliteration: Chaudah Vidiaa Saaangeet Brahamay Bisan Mahaysur Bhaylay.
translation: Fourteen branches of education, musicology and Brahma, Visnu, Mahesa are put together;

gurmukhi: ਸਨਕਾਦਿਕ ਲਖ ਨਾਰਦਾ ਸੁਕ ਬਿਅਾਸ ਲਖ ਸੇਖ ਨਵੇਲੇ
transliteration: Sanakaadik Lakh Naaradaa Souk Biaas Lakh Saykh Navaylay.
translation: If Lakhs of ses, serpent, Sukr, Vyas, Narad, Sanal et al. are all collected there;

gurmukhi: ਗਿਅਾਨ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਸਿਮਰਣ ਘਣੇ ਦਰਸਨ ਵਰਨ ਗੁਰੂ ਬਹੁ ਚੇਲੇ
transliteration: Giaan Dhiaan Simaran Ghanay Darasan Varan Guroo Bahu Chaylay.
translation: Myriad's of knowledge's, meditations, recitations, philosophies, varnas and guru-disciples are there; they all are nothing.

gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਾ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਗੁਰਾਂ ਗੁਰੁ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਮੂਲ ਗੁਰ ਬਚਨ ਸੁਹੇਲੇ
transliteration: Pooraa Satigur Guraan Guru Mantr Mool Gur Bachan Suhaylay.
translation: The perfect Guru (Lord) is the Guru of the gurus and the holy discourse of the Guru is the basis of all the mantras.

gurmukhi: ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਹੈ ਨੇਤਿ ਨੇਤਿ ਨਮੋ ਨਮੋ ਕੇਲੇ
transliteration: Akad Kadaa Guru Sabadu Hai Nayti Nayti Namo Namo Kaylay.
translation: The tale of the Word of the Guru is ineffable; it is neti neti (not this not this). One should always bow before him.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵੇਲੇ ॥੨੦॥
transliteration: Guramoukh Soukh Phalu Anmrit Vaylay ?20?
translation: This pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs is attained in the early ambrosial hours.

gurmukhi: ੨੧ ਗੁਰੂ ਤੁੱਲ ਕੁਛ ਨਹੀਂ ਹੈ
translation: Nothing is there equal to Guru

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਅਾਖੀਅਨਿ ਲਖ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਹੁਕਮੀ ਬੰਦੇ
transliteration: Chaar Padaarad Aakheeani Lakh Padaarad Houkamee Banday.
translation: Four ideals (dharma arth kam and moks) are said to be but such millions of ideals are servants (of Lord, the Guru).

gurmukhi: ਰਿਧਿ ਸਿਧਿ ਨਿਧਿ ਲਖ ਸੇਵਕੀ ਕਾਮਧੇਣੁ ਲਖ ਵਗ ਚਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Ridhi Sidhi Nidhi Lakh Sayvakee Kaamadhaynu Lakh Vag Charanday.
translation: In His service are millions of miraculous powers and treasures and He has herds of wish fulfilling cows grazing there.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਪਾਰਸ ਪਥਰੋਲੀਅਾ ਪਾਰਜਾਤ ਲਖ ਬਾਗ ਫਲੰਦੇ
transliteration: Lakh Paaras Padaroleeaa Paarajaati Lakh Baag Phaladay.
translation: He has lakhs of philosopher's stones and gardens of fruitful wish fulfilling trees.

gurmukhi: ਚਿਤਵਣ ਲਖ ਚਿੰਤਾਮਣੀ ਲਖ ਰਸਾੲਿਣ ਕਰਦੇ ਛੰਦੇ
transliteration: Chitavan Lakh Chintaamanee Lakh Rasaain Karaday Chhanday.
translation: At one wink of the Guru, lakhs of wish fulfilling gems (chintamini) and elixirs are sacrifice unto Him.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਰਤਨ ਰਤਨਾਗਰਾਂ ਸਭ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਸਭ ਫਲ ਸਿਮਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Lakh Ratan Ratanaagaraa Sabh Nidhaan Sabh Phal Simaranday.
translation: Millions of jewels, all the treasures of oceans and all the fruits recite his praises.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਭਗਤੀ ਲਖ ਭਗਤ ਹੋੲਿ ਕਰਾਮਾਤ ਪਰਚੈ ਪਰਚੰਦੇ
transliteration: Lakh Bhagatee Lakh Bhagat Hoi Karaamaat Parachai Parachanday.
translation: Millions of devotees and miracle mongers move around engrossed in hypocrisies.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਅਾਲਾ ਅਜਰੁ ਜਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Saadhasangu Piram Piaalaa Ajaru Jaranday.
translation: The true disciple of the Guru, merging their consciousness in the Word, drinks and assimilates the unbearable cup of the love of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਕਿਰਪਾ ਸਤਸੰਗਿ ਮਿਲੰਦੇ ॥੨੧॥੧੪॥
transliteration: Gur Kirapaa Satasangi Miladay ?21?16?solaan?
translation: By the grace of the Guru, people come and join the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਲਟਿ ਪਵਨ ਮਨ ਮੀਨ ਕੀ ਚਪਲ ਗਤਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪਰਚੇ ਪਰਮਪਦ ਪਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Ulati Pavan Man Meen Kee Chapal Gati , Satigur Parachay Paramapad Paaay Hai ?
translation: By practicing Naam Simran (meditation on Lord's name) one can turn the wind-like wayward mind into sharp and swift movement of fish. Developing association with the word of True Guru, one attains noble state.

gurmukhi: ਸੂਰ ਸਰ ਸੋਖਿ ਪੋਖਿ ਸੋਮ ਸਰ ਪੂਰਨ ਕੈ ਬੰਧਨ ਦੇ ਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਸਰ ਅਪੀਅ ਪਿਅਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Soor Sar Sokhi Pokhi Som Sar Pooran Kai , Bandhan Day Mrit Sar Apeea Piaaay Hai ?
translation: Nectar of life (blissful peace) is obtained only by meditation. By burning away the indestructible ego and by killing the imperishable mind, leaving all doubts and suspicions, those who stabilise their body, their life-force finds a direction.

gurmukhi: ਅਜਰਹਿ ਜਾਰਿ ਮਾਰਿ ਅਮਰਹਿ ਭ੍ਰਾਤਿ ਛਾਡਿ ਅਸਥਿਰ ਕੰਧ ਹੰਸ ਅਨਤ ਨ ਧਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Ajarahi Jaari Maari Amarahi Bhraati Chhaadi , Asadir Kandh Hans Anat N Dhaaay Hai ?
translation: By burning away the indestructible ego and by killing the imperishable mind, leaving all doubts and suspicions, those who stabilise their body, their life-force finds a direction.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਦੈ ਅਾਦ ਨਾਦੈ ਨਾਦ ਸਲਲੈ ਸਲਿਲ ਮਿਲਿ ਬ੍ਹਮੈ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਮਿਲਿ ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾੲੇ ਹੈ ॥੧੬॥
transliteration: Aadai Aad Naadai Naad Salalai Salil Mili , Brahamai Braham Mili Sahaj Samaaay Hai ?16?
translation: As the space merges with space, air with air and water mixes up with its source, so does the life-force integrates with the radiance of the Lord and supreme bliss is experienced. (16)
